thread.section_title: KatchAKid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KatchAKid | katchakid.com
thread.title: Russ Baumann

author: Russ Baumann
title: Russ Baumann
text:
Our dealings with the home office and Pearl were professional and friendly. The field measurement and install coordination by her went according to plan. A+++ service.
On the install, Lavandis and Mike did a great job. They called ahead, were on time, were courteous to us, answered all of our questions, showed us how everything worked and explained the Katchakid warranty. A+++ service.
I would recommend this team without any reservations.
RMBaumann, Chandler, AZ
